description: Try our easy to follow Frozen Dessert Blocks/Pops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Frozen Dessert Blocks/Pops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 48 drops food colouring (we used yellow and red)
3 pkt instant vanilla pudding mix (100g each)

recipeInstructions.text: Make each pudding mix separately following packet instructions. Add yellow food colour to 1 batch, red to the 2nd batch and both yellow and red colour to 3rd batch to reach the desired colours.
Divide yellow mixture between paper cups and tap firmly on the bench to settle and level. Repeat layers with red and orange mixtures.
Insert paddle pop sticks into centre and freeze for 2 hours or until solid.
